properties.name: openbis.filename.ignored-prefix
properties.description: A prefix that is stripped from the file's path.

properties.name: qbic.access-management.datasource.url
properties.description: The jdbc url to the datasource from which access control information can be fetched.

properties.name: qbic.access-management.datasource.username
properties.description: The username for the datasource from which access control information is fetched.

properties.name: qbic.access-management.datasource.password
properties.description: The password for the datasource from which access control information is fetched.

properties.name: qbic.access-token.salt
properties.description: A hex string used as salt for the personal access tokens.

properties.name: qbic.access-token.iteration-count
properties.description: The number of iterations used for encrypting personal access tokens.
